body_html:
@sendit2me Hi Peter, I ran in the exact same problem.
I managed to work around it by converting the VarLenFeatures to FixedLenFeatures:

def fix_feature_spec(feature_spec):
    for key, feature in feature_spec.items():
        if isinstance(feature, tf.VarLenFeature):
            feature_spec[key] = tf.FixedLenFeature(shape=[1], dtype=feature.dtype, default_value=None)

I also share my jupyter notebook with you where I build a model (based on the wide and deep tutorial) and export it to a SavedModel: https://gist.github.com/nubbel/a26b6cbb21c34bc36abbe76b850f5541
(sorry for the verbose debug logs and deprecation warnings, don't have the time for cleaning this up right now)

Hope that helps!
